description: Cost breakdown table with inline editing and bulk operations - extracted from projects/page.tsx

behavioral_assertions.description: Component displays cost breakdown table when project is expanded
behavioral_assertions.verification: Provide projectId, mock getCostBreakdownByProject, verify table renders

behavioral_assertions.description: Component shows 'No budget created yet' when cost breakdown is empty
behavioral_assertions.verification: Mock empty array, verify empty state with CTA button

behavioral_assertions.description: Component enables inline editing on row double-click
behavioral_assertions.verification: Double-click row, verify input fields appear, edit, save

behavioral_assertions.description: Component validates required fields before saving
behavioral_assertions.verification: Clear cost line field, attempt save, verify validation error

behavioral_assertions.description: Component shows unsaved changes bar when inline edits pending
behavioral_assertions.verification: Make edit, verify changes bar appears with count

behavioral_assertions.description: Component supports keyboard shortcuts (Cmd+S to save, Escape to cancel)
behavioral_assertions.verification: Make edit, press Cmd+S, verify save triggered

behavioral_assertions.description: Component enables multi-select for bulk delete operations
behavioral_assertions.verification: Enable bulk mode, select multiple rows, delete, verify all removed
